attributes.action: immediately introduce legislation to make December 2009 a 'we will carry out a review' free month!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every time I read about what Gordon Brown has done today the end result is 'we will review that decision'.  we need a short period of respite from Gordon Brown reviews and people should support this petition to make December 2009 a 'we will review that decision' free month!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
